title: AI Use Boundaries
subtitle: Know instantly whether an AI use case is appropriate.

decisionTree.question1: Does this involve client data or PII?
decisionTree.question2: Will this go outside the organization?
decisionTree.answer2yes: YELLOW — Get a second pair of eyes before sending.
decisionTree.fallback: Ask your team lead or check the traffic light card.

green.label: GREEN — Go Ahead
green.description: Administrative tasks. No additional approval needed.

yellow.label: YELLOW — Second Pair of Eyes
yellow.description: Requires review before use. Get supervisor sign-off.
process: Use AI to create a draft

red.label: RED — Do Not Use AI
red.description: These tasks are off-limits for AI. No exceptions.
items: Client names, case notes, or any PII

pii.title: What counts as PII?
neverEnter: Any combination that could identify someone

safeAlternative.bad: Summarize case notes for John Smith, DOB 3/15/1995
safeAlternative.good: Summarize this progress note: [paste text with all identifying info removed]

incident.title: If You Accidentally Enter Client PII
steps: Stop immediately — don't continue the conversation
Document what was entered (screenshot if possible)
incident.note: No punishment for honest reporting. We want to learn from incidents, not hide them.
